member.summary: Emitter class - returns the generated SQL statement

member.summary: Builds a query to delete an object from the datastore using the specfied keys

member.summary: Builds the count query for the collection

member.name: M:COFRS.SqlServer.Emitter.BuildCollectionListQuery``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.Object}},COFRS.Rql.RqlNode,System.Int32,System.Int32,COFRS.Rql.RqlNode,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter})
member.summary: Builds the count query for the collection
member.param: The list of key value pairs that limit the scope of the collection
The number of records in the collection
The maximum number of items that can be included in a collection batch
The page filter that applies to the collection
Returns the list of parameters that need to be bound to the SQL statement

member.summary: Returns a formatted WHERE clause representation of the filters in the query string

member.param: The RQL node representation of the query string

member.param: The RQL node representation of the query string
